entry.title: Yii2开启url美化不生效的问题
entry.content:
最终要显示的url格式为：http://localhost/yii2/frontend/web/site/about
修改/config/main.php文件，在 'components'=>[] 中添加如下代码：

'urlManager' => [
            'enablePrettyUrl' => true,//将?r=site%2Fabout美化为/site/about
            'showScriptName' => false,//隐藏index.php 
            'rules' => [
            ],
        ],

另外还需在index.php入口文件同级的目录下添加.htaccess文件：

Options +FollowSymLinks
    IndexIgnore */*
    RewriteEngine on

    # if a directory or a file exists, use it directly
    RewriteCond %{REQUEST_FILENAME} !-f
    RewriteCond %{REQUEST_FILENAME} !-d

    # otherwise forward it to index.php
    RewriteRule . index.php
